about_the_game:
Your World is an online party game and social platform that allows hundreds of players to jump into user-created worlds and theme parks loaded with activities and fun mini-games.

  • 40 mini-game styles: Competitive racing, flying challenges, shooters, side-scrollers, platforming, and interactive game challenges.
  • Amusement park rides: Rideable steel and wooden coasters, plus rideable flat rides.
  • Custom Avatars: Change clothing, hairstyle, facial features, and apparel.
  • Voice Chat With Lip-Sync: Avatar mouth shape matches your speech in real-time.
  • Custom apparel shops, vehicle rental, and inventory systems.
  • Networking: Custom server allows 1000 live players in each world instance and tens of thousands across multiple servers.
  • Live Shows: Fireworks and synchronized light & fountain shows. All live!
  • Live Concerts: Real-time dual video streams to 2 massive outdoor displays for live performances, shows, and awards.
  • Avatar AI: Character AI adjusts to your environment and voice expression.
  • Leaderboards: Massive outdoor LED leaderboards for player competitions and rewards. ​
  • Streamed music and videos throughout the parks
  • Over 2000 assets, 60 libraries, and 40 mini-game style

Your Word's rich mini-game library allows you to mix and match gameplay styles with our expansive library. Here are just some of the games you can play:

  • Go-Kart Racing
  • Jet Ski Racing
  • Paintball Shooter
  • Hang Gliding Challenge
  • Motocross Racing
  • Sports Car Racing
  • Platforming Games
  • Street Bike Racing
  • Obstacle Course Race
  • Side-Scroller Shooter
  • Top-Down Shooter
  • Endless Runner
  • Sky-Diving Challenge
  • Stunt Jump Challenge
  • ATV Racing
  • Street Bike Racing
  • Mech Shooter

name: Your World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 560 (2GB)/AMD Radeon 7850 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

reviews:
“Full of breathtaking visuals and unique attractions...Playing Imagineer is fun, and seeing the creative ideas others come up with is equally exciting.”
MiceChat

“Merging the power of Unreal Engine with Pantera’s own proprietary technology, this platform is not just another digital space but a vibrant, immersive 3D social environment….The array of features in Your World is as diverse as it is impressive. Players can engage in an eclectic mix of activities—from racing and flight simulations to experiencing live concerts and platforming adventures.”
Gaming Lyfe
short_description: Your World is an online party game and social platform that allows hundreds of players to jump into user-created worlds and theme parks loaded with activities and fun mini-games.
